img.alt: A number line representing a clock from 12:00 to 1:00. There are large ticks for 15-minute intervals (12:00, 12:15, 12:30, 12:45, 1:00) and smaller ticks for each minute. A brown vertical bar labeled 'A' points to the 10th minute after 12:45, indicating the time 12:55.

qti-item-body.p: What time is shown on the number line?

qti-content-body.p: Not quite. The point 'A' is located after the 12:00 mark but before the 1:00 mark, so the hour is 12. The mark for 12:45 is shown. The next medium tick represents 5 minutes later, which is 12:50. The next medium tick represents another 5 minutes, which is 12:55. Point 'A' is on that mark. The time is 12:55.
